com.neatnodes.genome

Class Genome

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.neatnodes.genome.Genome

  • public class Genome
extends java.lang.Object
    A Genome consists of Nodes and Connections and implements a function.
    Author:
    Sam Griffin

    • Constructor Detail

      • Genome

        public Genome(InnovationManager iManager)
        Creates a new Genome with a single bias node. After creating a Genome, input, hidden and output nodes must be added manually. The bias node will be created automatically by this constructor. However, the bias node will still need to be manually connected to other nodes. This ensures that every Genome has a bias node as it's node 0.
        Parameters:
        iManager - The InnovationManager that the Genome should use when creating it's Connections and reproducing.

    • Method Detail

      • getNumberOfInputs

        public int getNumberOfInputs()
        Get the number of input nodes in the Genome.
        Returns:
        The number of input nodes.

      • getNumberOfOutputs

        public int getNumberOfOutputs()
        Get the number of output nodes in the Genome.
        Returns:
        The number of output nodes.

      • getNode

        public Node getNode(int key)
        Get the Node with a given key in the Genome.
        Parameters:
        key - The key (label) of the Node.
        Returns:
        The Node.

      • getConnection

        public Connection getConnection(int key)
        Get the Connection with a given key in the Genome. The key will be the same as the Connection's innovation number.
        Parameters:
        key - The key (label) of the Connection.
        Returns:
        The Connection.

      • getNodeGenes

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Node> getNodeGenes()
        Get a HashMap containing all Nodes in the Genome.
        Returns:
        The map of Nodes.

      • getConnectionGenes

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,Connection> getConnectionGenes()
        Get a HashMap containing all Connections in the Genome.
        Returns:
        The map of Connections.

      • addNode

        public void addNode(int label,
                    int type)
        Adds a new node to the Genome.
        Parameters:
        label - The label for the Genome, which will also be the key used to reference it.
        type - The Node type. Valid values are Node.BIAS, Node.INPUT, Node.OUTPUT, or Node.HIDDEN.

      • addConnection

        public void addConnection(int inNodeNumber,
                          int outNodeNumber,
                          double weight,
                          boolean enabled,
                          int innovationNumber)
        Adds a new Connection to the Genome. Takes an innovation number as an argument rather than generating it to allow for passing in specific innovation numbers from previous generations after the innovations from the previous generation have already been reset.
        Parameters:
        inNodeNumber - The key {label) of an existing Node in the Genome to be the in Node of the Connection.
        outNodeNumber - The key {label) of an existing Node in the Genome to be the out Node of the Connection.
        weight - The weight that the Connection will have.
        enabled - If true the Connection will be enabled.
        innovationNumber - The innovation number for the connection. This will also be used as the key to reference the Connection in the Genome.

      • mutate

        public void mutate(Configuration configuration)
        Applies a set of mutations to the Genome. Should be called after a new Genome is bred as part of the NEAT algorithm.
        Parameters:
        configuration - A Configuration object that parameters for the mutation will be drawn from.

      • mutateWeights

        void mutateWeights()
        Performs a weight mutation. Should only be called internally and by unit tests.

      • nodeMutation

        void nodeMutation()
        Performs a node mutation. Should only be called internally and by unit tests.

      • linkMutation

        void linkMutation()
        Performs a link mutation. Should only be called internally and by unit tests.

      • cloneGenome

        public Genome cloneGenome()
        Returns a clone of this Genome with all the same nodes and connections represented by new objects. The new Genome will have no fitness set and be open for editing even if this one has already been locked.
        Returns:
        The clone of the Genome.

      • writeInputs

        public void writeInputs(java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> inputs)
        Write a set of input values to the input nodes of the Genome in preparation for running it. This method will throw an exception if you try to set the value of any non-input nodes.
        Parameters:
        inputs - A map containing keys mapping to input values. The keys must correspond to the keys of the input nodes of the Genome, or an exception will be thrown.

      • readOutputs

        public java.util.HashMap<java.lang.Integer,java.lang.Double> readOutputs()
        Retrieve the current values on the output nodes of the Genome after running it.
        Returns:
        A map containing keys mapping to values. The keys correspond to the keys of the output nodes of the Genome.

      • run

        public void run()
        Run the Genome's whole network for one step.

      • reset

        public void reset()
        Sets all node values except the bias node back to 0. The bias node is set to 1.

      • isFitnessMeasured

        public boolean isFitnessMeasured()
        Check if the Genome's fitness has already been measured.
        Returns:
        True if the fitness has been measured.

      • setFitness

        public void setFitness(double fitness)
        Set a fitness value for the Genome. Calling this method will finalise the Genome so that it can no longer be changed, as doing so would invalidate the fitness value.
        Parameters:
        fitness - The fitness value to set.

      • getFitness

        public double getFitness()
        Get the Genome's fitness value. This method will throw an exception if the fitness has not been set yet.
        Returns:
        The fitness value.
